short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logs the current URL and allows for later review. Logging is done only if requested by the user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension logs the current URL and allows for later review. Logging is done only if requested by the user. Following options are available 
1. Log only the current tab.
2. Log all the open tabs. 
3. View the logged URLs.
4. Clear the logged entries.
5. Download the text file containing all the logged URLs.
